root_causes.description: High volume of AR exceptions due to incorrect data entry and validation errors
Bank duplicates caused by inadequate reconciliation processes
root_causes.financial_impact: Potential misstatement risk due to duplicate transactions

remediations.action: Implement enhanced data validation rules and training for AR data entry
remediations.estimated_effort: 2 weeks for rule development and 1 week for training
remediations.success_criteria: Reduction in AR exceptions by 80% in the next quarter

remediations.action: Revise bank reconciliation procedures to include duplicate detection
remediations.estimated_effort: 1 week to update procedures and 1 week for staff training
remediations.success_criteria: Elimination of duplicate bank entries in the next reconciliation cycle
